data.actual_result: The No results manifying glass just fades out and the list of members doesn't come back, everything's empty. Closing/reopening keyboard fixes the issue
data.expected_result: The list of all members should be shown again when erasing search field, and you should be able to make a new search
data.short_description: Everything disappears when cancelling a search that produced no results in Add Member channel override, preventing you from making a new search
data.steps_to_repro: - Pick a channel in a server you can manage roles - Go to channel settings > Permissions > Add member - Input random letters in the search field so it shows No results - Erase the content of the textfield and try to search for something else
